name: connect-wallet
code: const userData = await showConnect({ appDetails onFinish: (data) => setUser(data) userSession })
notes: Returns user session with address and profile

name: stx-transfer
code: await makeSTXTokenTransfer({ recipient amount senderKey network anchorMode: AnchorMode.Any })

name: contract-call
code: await makeContractCall({ contractAddress contractName functionName functionArgs senderKey network anchorMode: AnchorMode.Any })

name: deploy-contract
code: await makeContractDeploy({ contractName codeBody senderKey network anchorMode: AnchorMode.Any })
notes: codeBody is Clarity code as string

name: list
notes: Array of CV values of same type

name: get-balance
notes: Returns STX balance and all token balances

name: get-transactions
notes: Paginated results with limit and offset

name: call-read-only
code: const result = await callReadOnlyFunction({ contractAddress contractName functionName functionArgs senderAddress network })
notes: No transaction needed for read-only calls
